message_1: What is the minimum number of crossings required to realize the trefoil knot as a proper knot diagram in the standard projection?
message_2: The minimum number of crossings required to realize the trefoil knot as a proper knot diagram in the standard projection is 3. The trefoil knot is the simplest nontrivial knot and is also known as the (3,2)-torus knot.
